messages.message:
It seems when I upload via the UI I am limited to uploading 100 files? Is that intentional? Dragging and dropping a folder with 1000 files in it.
EDIT: Found that if I upload the folder itself it limits it to 100, if I drag the 1000 files independantly it will upload all of them
This sounds like it may be a browser limitation, but something on my plate is to make uploading large numbers of files more robust, and I'll look into this at the same time
